content: a resistance hat based on the norwegian resistance hat links to the story in the pattern maine is having it s own nightmare with ice right now and like many knitters i want to show my support for our immigrant communities i thought very hard before creating my own pattern for a melt-the-ice hat because there is what i m sure is a very lovely pattern already here i wanted to create this hat as a free pattern so that people who couldn t afford a pattern could participate in craftivism i also wanted people to be able to donate directly to a local charity rather than have a significant portion of their donation taken up in fees this pattern can be made in 4 different sizes with yarns from fingering to bulky please send me a message if you need help or find any errors because i have only made it once
